decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (0001 Rev. A (Plans and elevations). Received: 24/05/2013. 0001 Rev. A (Location plan). Received: 26/06/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the single-family dwelling house known as 53 Napier Road, Isleworth, TW7 7HP and for no other purpose (i.e. it shall not be used as a bedroom, living room, office or other business use or as a separate dwelling and should not include kitchen facilities).
description: Retrospective application for the erection of a detached shed in the rear end of the garden to the house
